name: Cupies
description:
Cupies

This game was made for a school challenge: build a game in 3 hours. This is a polished version of the prototype. The goal is to reach the chest at the end of the level. if you can reach the chest with more Cupies you will get more points.

You can stack Cupies by jumping on top of another Cupie . Be aware that a taller stack will make platforming a lot more difficult!

Controls:

Walking: Arrow Keys

Jumping: Space / Arrow Up

Reset: Backspace / Esc
